name: Astro-Md
description: A Whatsapp md bot built in NodeJs to make experience better
Put words here. If you want it enabled in your bot otherwise leave it blank
Fill the value true if you want bot send Level up message in chat.
Fill the value true if you want bot to read all messages.
Enter your desired prefix for bot.
The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

SESSION_ID.description: Please put your SESSION_ID here,if you don't have visit https://secktorbot.herokuapp.com/session

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Enter the message here which you want to see in Welcome when a new user joins a Group.

description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)
Put here language name SL or EN
Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.
